snippet: Wall Street brightened on Wednesday after remarks from Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, raised the prospect that monetary stimulus might remain in place longer than expected.
abstract: Stock market posts modest gains after remarks from Ben S Bernanke, Federal Reserve chairman, raise prospect that monetary stimulus might remain in place longer than expected.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street brightened on Wednesday after remarks from Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, raised the prospect that monetary stimulus might remain in place longer than expected.

headline.main: Markets Rise Slightly After Bernanke Remarks
headline.print_headline: Markets Rise Slightly After Bernanke Remarks
